contents.text: Thank you for calling Literably in San Francisco, the only reading assessment that listens to your students.
To reach our support team, press 1.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot why student readings aren’t uploading correctly
As a veteran teacher, I need help fixing audio playback errors so my students can complete their assessments.
Troubleshoot JSON output errors in Literably’s API integration for our reading assessment pipeline
Could you please help me fix the assessment platform? It’s not loading my students’ recordings.
I’m having trouble with the audio recording feature during student assessments—utterances aren’t being captured properly.

contents.text: For billing and subscription questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify my latest invoice charge and update my payment method
I need to review and update my subscription billing plan for my class.
Review our subscription’s invoicing details and adjust seat counts for the upcoming term
I’m confused about the charge on my subscription and need someone to explain my bill.
I need to update the payment method on my institution’s subscription and clarify upcoming invoice charges.

contents.text: To reach our sales team, press 2.
To schedule a free demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team to schedule your free demo.

navigationGoals: Book a quick demo to see how Literably works
I’d like to schedule a walkthrough demo to see how Literably can support my students’ reading progress.
Schedule a demo of Literably’s API-driven formative assessment with real-time analytics dashboard
I’d like to schedule a demo of your reading assessment tool before I sign up.
Could I schedule a demonstration to observe how the platform tracks student reading progress in real time?

contents.text: For account setup and onboarding, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account onboarding specialists.

navigationGoals: Initiate account setup and onboarding for my school
I need assistance setting up my teacher account and uploading my first class roster.
Configure our new district account with SAML SSO and SCIM user provisioning for teacher onboarding
Could you walk me through setting up my new account and adding my students?
I require assistance with initial account configuration and importing my class roster.
